The Laughter & Secrets of Love Actually: 20 Years Later – A Diane Sawyer Special
《真爱至上》上映20周年特别节目
introduction: The special will look at how the film became a beloved Christmas tradition and a global sensation, with new insight into behind-the-scenes secrets and iconic scenes. The special will also examine how the COVID-19 pandemic refocused the ways we love and connect and the omnipresent acts of kindness inside our families and communities.“The Laughter & Secrets of Love Actually: 20 Years Later – A Diane Sawyer Special” will air on Tuesday 29th November 2022 (8:00-9:00 p.m. EST), on ABC, and it will be available the next day on Hulu.
